post.text: Proud of you Donald Trump Jr. - you were great! Keep up the incredible work at the Trump Org. Because of you, Ivanka, Eric, and Tiffany - I have this opportunity to give back. It is time to MAKE AMERICA SAFE AND GREAT AGAIN!

comment.author: Maggie
comment.text: Love Donald Trump Jr. Great speech and wonderful family. So proud they are willing to give their time and resources to this country to help save us from become run over by a socialist regime. Go Trump, we are voting for you and have supported you from the beginning!

replies.author: Ambir
replies.text: True I vote for him ðŸ˜Š
